resources.string: Whoops, something went wrong please try again later

string-array.name: main_list_information
string-array.item: Allows you to view images taken by Mars rover where the sols range from 1 to 1000
APOD which stands for astronomical picture of the day does exactly what it says.
Earth Imagery, select the location of your choice and see the image through the eyes of the satellite.
Provides information on the daily imagery collected by DSCOVR\'s Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera (EPIC) instrument.
Search through the wide database of NASA.
CAD which stands for Close Approach Data, provides access to current close-approach data for all asteroids and comets.
Near Earth Objects which provides Asteroid information near earth.
